attributes.action: Make Sian Phillips a Dame of the British Empire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While accepting that my regard for her might be deemed somewhat excessive, I do not think it is untrue to say that the magnificent Welsh actress Sian Phillips has never been accorded the respect and adultation she deserves.  A DBE is the very least that can be given to this veritable goddess.
